name: Box Overboard! [LD40]
description:
BOX OVERBOARD!

===============================================

A small physics game for Ludum Dare 40. The theme of the game jam was "The more you have, the worse it is".  A game of risk vs reward as you keep yourself above water.

Art/Music/Game - Durrsly

Controls

===============================================

WASD - Move

Left Mouse - Push Blocks

Right Mouse - Grab Blocks

Space - Drop Held Block
